title: do u want to know why this game is not fun anymore
body: why  this game is not fun to play anymore couse of the trollers i was playin ranked and i gotr trolled 10 games in a row from gold promos to s2  and last game i was chosen jungle so my bottom lane went jungle without asking me my support wanted to go top and did not ask  to go top my mid went bott with mid champ and i had to dodge the game and i lost 10 lp from that and i came to a conclusion this game suckks now  and im quitting league
